thread.title: Record bank holiday weekend for Leeds Bradford airport
thread.title_full: Record bank holiday weekend for Leeds Bradford airport | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Record bank holiday weekend for Leeds Bradford airport
text:
Credit: PA Leeds Bradford Airport says it's expecting its busiest ever weekend over the Bank Holiday with fifty thousand passengers travelling through the terminal.
“Leeds Bradford’s growth in passenger numbers continues to prove that Yorkshire holidaymakers and travellers want to fly close to home rather than having to risk traffic delays and congestion on the motorway network flying from other airports. ’’
– Tony Hallwood Leeds Bradford® Airports Aviation Development Director Last updated Fri 28 Aug 2015 Travel Hull sheffield York North Yorkshire lincolnshire Leeds south yorkshire East Yorkshire West Yorkshire North Lincolnshire
